title: The Questioning city
creator_credit: Eric Fullilove, Donald Carter and British Travel and Holiday Association
brief_description: The university city of Cambridge, scholastic and social life, historic University Buildings, loveliness of the Backs and surrounding countryside. Sequences on the Cavendish Laboratory includes a resume of the outstanding scientific and technological achievements of its scientists and research workers.
